name: Cat Dragster Race
description:
You challanged the MAN CAT A1 15t 8x8 container carrier truck to a race.

-- No RNG! --

--Controlls--
Right click:  Start / Shift gears 
Left click: Reset
!!!Enter:  MUTE!!!!

The meter shows the current torque of the cat engine.
Timing stats are shown after every successful race.

Comment your best times.
My best is ~4.7s

Soundtrack by silomat

Made for the mini-jam-80-cats.

The sound designe is on point and can't be better.
The forward speed is a function of rpm, gear ratio, gear resistens, air resistens and probably some bugs.
